website_summaries.verdict: A small, inexpensive keyboard that can be bought in one of seven colors. An excellent portable choice if you’re on a tight budget.
pros: Small enough to easily fit in a backpack or briefcase
Compatible with four of the major operating systems
cons: Battery indication light doesn’t come on until the batteries nearly depleted

website_summaries.verdict: A keyboard that is easy to use and a fun way to add a pop of color to your work station.
pros: Choose from an array of colors to customize your backlit keyboard's look
We loved the built-in rechargeable battery, and were equally impressed with its longevity
Arteck did a commendable job making the keyboard compact without compromising on comfort
Buttons and spacing feel like that of a normal-sized keyboard
cons: There is no battery percentage indicator
Instead, a blue light flashes when the battery starts to get low

website_summaries.verdict: This affordable keyboard is smaller and more compact than a regular keyboard but has problems with the keys.
pros: Responsive back-lit keys light up in 7 colors
cons: Keys sometimes have a tendency to stick or pop off

website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, easy-to-use Bluetooth keyboard that works with all major operating systems and has some great features to maximize battery life.
pros: Compatible with all major operating systems that support Bluetooth
There are two different brightness levels to save on battery life
The rechargeable battery can last up to 6 months between charges
cons: Some buyers experienced some disconnecting and typing error issues, but the company is quick to send replacements

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keyboard for the Wacom Cintiq 22HD Pen Display
customer_reviews.text: I'm a designer who uses a Wacom Cintiq pen display. I always struggled with where to put my keyboard so I could access it for quick keys and shortcuts in programs like Photoshop or Sketchbook Pro. This keyboard fits perfectly in-between the stand legs and is so easy to access while drawing now.
customer_reviews.author: BRD56

customer_reviews.title: How can it be this difficult?
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard has been a nightmare. It constantly becomes disconnected from my computer, and it also somehow makes my Bluetooth application on my computer disappear. I have tried fixing it several times, because after some time, the Bluetooth comes back, but will eventually stop working again. Its the strangest thing, it literally deletes Bluetooth from my computer. My father is an experienced computer programmer and even he struggles with the thing. Buy one with a USB dongle and save yourself the headache. It is a nice keyboard when operating correctly, though.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Welch

customer_reviews.title: Compact with color changing back light options
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is very slim and lightweight which is what I wanted. Make sure you stick on the provided little 3m rubber bases as the back is smooth. The keyboard connected to my Dell laptop on the initial setup. I did remove one star because the “ I and O “ buttons stick a little. I love the option if being able to change the back light color. Update on 01-15-2018: More keys sticking now. Dropping the stars from 4 down to 2. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: TroysHobbies

customer_reviews.title: Does not work reliably
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this keyboard for over 2 months now, and I’ve used, or tried to use it, daily. When it *is* working, it’s a fine little keyboard for $20, and I like the colored backlit keys. But almost every time I use it, I spend several minutes trying to get it connect to my pc. Oftentimes, I have to unpair and then re-pair (ha!) it to get it to work, and sometimes it still doesn’t connect. If I can’t get it to work within 5 or 10 minutes, I end up having to shut it off and plugging in my old keyboard. It’s too late for me to return it, but I’ll be looking for a different mini keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Works... sometimes...
customer_reviews.text: While the sleek design and back-light are visually appealing, this keyboard fails in functionality. I find myself constantly resetting and re-pairing because this keyboard loses its Bluetooth connection every 5-10 minutes. Also, the battery life is significantly decreased when the back-light is on (not really shocking), so I didn't end up using it much anyway. Pros: Good looking design Decent build quality (metal, not plastic) Very thin and light for portability Cons: Frequent connection issues Poor battery life Keys sometimes require an uncomfortable amount of pressure to register Overall, I would not recommend this keyboard. You're better off trying something a little more robust and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: renegadespork

customer_reviews.title: Nearly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid little keyboard. Many colors to choose from, buttons work well, hooks up via Bluetooth fast, the battery life is good, all in all there isn't anything to hate about this thing. I gave it 4 stars, mainly because after a handful of seconds of no keyboard use the lighting turns off. It immediately lights back up once you hit any key. This helps conserve the battery, bit it would be nice to be enable to set whether or not you want it continuously on or not. Not a big deal at all, just a super minor complaint. The keyboard is also magnetic, and it sticks to my monitor case/ stand perfectly. Very nice keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Perfect size for use with iPad Pro 11" -Slim; fits in tablet sleeve with iPad -Battery charge lasts a LONG time. Have gone three months so far on a single charge since purchase. -Connects very easily to iPad Pro Cons: -Flimsy. If you use the rubber feet stickers that are included, the keyboard will bend and flex as you type. -If you don't use the rubber feet stickers, the keyboard will slide all over the place while you're typing. -Backlight bleeds through around the keys. Not sure if this is the design, but it's a bit excessive.
customer_reviews.author: FH

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one month
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this keyboard for about one month . It rarely disconnected, illumination was great, size was perfect, lightweight, decent battery life, the works . Then the random double taps and disconnects started happening . I was still okay with it at that point, not a deal breaker . Then at one month all hell broke loose . It started disconnecting all the time, keystrokes wouldn't register . On the off chance that a keystroke did register, every keystroke ended up sticking and causing between 4 and 20 repeated characters . It's totally unusable now . Not recommended .
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: but the keys are a good size and quite visible in a dark setting
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a very handy keyboard. One of my bluetooth devices (an iPad) has given me an intermittently hard time about connecting to it (hence the 4 stars), but I'm really not certain if that's because of the keyboard, or the iPad. I've only tried connecting to a couple of other devices with it (a tablet/laptop with a less-nice keyboard, and a Pixel XL phone), but it's been okay with those. Otherwise, it's slender and lightweight, but the keys are a good size and quite visible in a dark setting. All in all, I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Eliezer

customer_reviews.title: BS design with horrible key layout.
customer_reviews.text: I've owned 2 of the Artek RF ultra-slim mini keyboards (the "bigger model") and they are my favorites keyboards and I've tried a lot of expensive keyboards. I thought this was full-sized and I wouldn't have bought originally had I known that. This keyboard is horrible in comparison. It's a Mac keyboard configuration so it doesn't have the Windows key where it's supposed to be at and it constantly causes mess-ups. Bluetooth is not reliable in any way shape or form. The devices disconnect all the time, messing up OBS. They lose connection. There is no print screen button on this keyboard, it's whack.
customer_reviews.author: Cale McCollough

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately, it's good to go
customer_reviews.text: Backlight came on at startup, then was never seen again. I liked the typing action, but the keyboard would never stay connected with my Latitude, and finally just searched and never connected. I kept thinking it would get better. Naw. UPDATED REVIEW: Arteck folks saw my negative review and immediately contacted me and offered to replace my nonfunctioning keyboard (they took care of shipping too). The replacement is working flawlessly. After consultation with them, I chose a stainless steel (HW086) version, which is slightly larger and more solid than some of its lightweight cousins; consequently for me it's easier to type on. Suffice it to say that the kind of customer attention shown by Arteck is exceedingly rare.
customer_reviews.author: nhoner

customer_reviews.title: Solid little keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard at first glance/use. I wish they'd included instructions about how to change the backlight colors in the little pamphlet that came with the keyboard, but I found it here on Amazon easily enough. I'm not going to speak to its durability because I just got it, but so far it's great. When it turns off but my iPad is on, the iPad keyboard pops up on screen so that's pretty nice. Oh, and it is fairly small, so if you have large hands or are easily frustrated, don't get this keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Needs Bluetooth Receiver
customer_reviews.text: Bought it to game on the couch. Computer didn't have bluetooth so I had to buy a bluetooth receiver also. Range is very small, and the keyboard has frequent disconnects and losses of range. The design and LED backlit keyboard is great. I'm on the couch about 10ft away and still have bad reception. Does not work if bluetooth receiver is behind the PC.
customer_reviews.author: OldThings

customer_reviews.title: This is a mini keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Nowhere in the title or description did it say this was a ‘mini’ keyboard (not standard size keys) and I missed the dimensions as I compared several keyboards. I was really looking forward to it, and it is nice design, other than the size, and lightweight. It is a bit flexible, but since it sits flat on the table, I think that’s fine. If you want to use it on your lap, it might be problematic. Picture shows it next to an Apple keyboard. Have to send it back because I can’t use a mini keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Fixer

customer_reviews.title: It's pefect
customer_reviews.text: This really is the perfect little keyboard. It's light and lighted! I love the colors and it even has a dimmer and brighter setting for each color. It's the same size as my tablet and with the way it's designed with the edges raised, the buttons don't get pushed when it's transported flat next to my tablet. There is no need for a mouse when I have a touch screen. My only wish is that I could recharge it with a C usb so I don't have to carry two charging cords around.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 3 days
customer_reviews.text: ******update******* The company reached out and replaced the item directly within days instead of a month like amazon would have taken. I will remove one star because the item should have lasted more than 3 days. 5 stars for the company which was very responsive. *******original review******* Received it on Monday and by Thursday it no longer charges. Replacement would take a month to arrive. Utter garbage and won't buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Moreno

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard received was considerably smaller than expected. I posted such in my reviews. the vendor contacted me, and contacted me and repeatedly contacted me asking the same questions over and over again. I replied a total of five times that I counted after I started counting. Other than the size I have no issues with the keyboard. But the over zealous and quite annoying response from the seller was annoying and unwelcomed. Seller PLEASE read you correspondence before you cut and paste your replies. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Jerome

customer_reviews.title: great until shift key stopped working. GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: Customer service is AMAZING. They read my review and contacted me quickly to provide me with a replacement. Hasn't come in yet, but going to 4 stars just based off customer service. Will update when it comes in again. These people are the real deal and will not leave you hanging. it was working perfectly and now it will not allow my laptop to recognize/use the shift keys, as you can see. i can't even add exclamation points to show how upsetting this is111
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is for everyone with defective laptop keyboards or wanting Bluetooth advantages of this keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: My original review was not so kind it was only 2 o 3 starts do to various reasons HOWEVER, the company itself is paying attention to their reviews - (please don't use this to take advantage it really isn't easy to alter your review) But their customer service is out of this world my major complaint was the sharp edges for an older finger and they are sending me at no cost to me a NEW ONE asap, improved just to satisfy their customer base! For real! I also loved the back lights. This is a company worth watching out for further product developments!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyboard for my Fire HD 8 (6th gen) tablet for more detailed tasks. I was delighted to find that it connected and works perfectly right out of the box. I also successfully connected to my Samsung S7 Edge cell phone. The keyboard is light yet sturdy and well laid out for a touch typist. The illumination is helpful in daylight and darkness and attractive. The lights go out during inactivity to conserve the battery. Included in the box are six round rubber feet to attach to the bottom and they give the keyboard stability on smooth surfaces. I'm very pleased with this well designed and useful product and recommend it without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Lewis

customer_reviews.title: YES!!!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't work. I can't get it to connect to my laptop. Lights don't work. The user manual is a terrible document that contains horrible Chinese to English gibberish translated instructions. The size would have been perfect had it worked. Disappointed. UPDATED review: YES! The company reached out to me immediately after I wrote the original review. They really wanted to make it right. I ended up receiving a new wireless keboard as a replacement for the USB keyboard. It works great, looks really nice, and is perfect for what I need. I really appreciate the top notch cutomer service I received from Arteck. You can't go wrong purchasing any of their products. Thanks Arteck!
customer_reviews.author: Portia

customer_reviews.title: SMALLER than regular keyboards. It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. It connected fine. It’s really thin, light, and the colors are nice. I have a few issues already. -ITS SMALLER THAN REGULAR KEYBOARDS. Notice the measurements!! It’s super thin and nice, I’m sure I’ll get used to it but I kinda wish I looked at it closer. -Mine only turns blue and green, not red. -The pause, skip forward, and skip backward buttons don’t work. I’m not sure if it’s just me or what. I tried it with iTunes, Spotify, YouTube, and Netflix. I have a newer Lenovo laptop. I haven’t tried it with any other device.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: It just works
customer_reviews.text: I gave this keyboard 5 stars because it works without issue. When I first got it, I charged it overnight, and in the morning turned it on, and it connected instantly. It works well throughout the day, it keeps up with my typing speed and lasts all day. At night, I turn it off, and recharge it for the next day. I have to add, that the first unit I received had some connection issues. I contacted them via facebook, and they gave assistance. It helped but did not resolve the problem, so they sent me a new one very easily. They definitely stand behind this product, and I'm happily typing away as I write this review.
customer_reviews.author: jangona

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slim wireless keyboard that I can take anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Its been a month and no problems! Very nice slim wireless keyboard that I can take anywhere. Also convenient can connect to my phone, tablet, and laptop making typing anywhere and everywhere possible. The lights help a lot at night and the colors and brightness adjustments you can make is a bonus. At a price like this its hard to beat! Update: lasted about 2months. 2-3 second delay when I type and that's not the worst of it. When I type every letter has a chance of repeating itself. SSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSOoooooooort offfffffffffffffffffffffffffffffff liiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiike thissssssssss. Nice looking compact keyboard, but waste of 20$. Now I'm off on a quest to find another one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin and awesome
customer_reviews.text: I got this keyboard to replace my laptop keyboard that quit working properly. It is great. It's thin and cool. The colored lights are a neat way to customize your machine. Using this instead of replacing the laptop keyboard was cheaper and easier. I even keep it plugged into the machine for power. I can see how this would be a very good keyboard for completely portable use for tablets, phones, laptops or pc's. I'd buy it again. Also unusual for an inexpensive device, it has a one year warranty and has contact and tech support info actually printed on the back of the keyboard itself. Get it now. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Rene M.

customer_reviews.title: updated: excellent seller, new keyboard works great
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/18: This seller is awesome, providing me a new keyboard to test out. Great communications! The new keyboard works as it should, the backlit colors are terrific & very helpful. Highly recommend this product & the seller that stands behind it. Returned, I don't mind purchasing Warehouse items but Amazon you must test items first. This wouldn't type a single letter, I have no idea what the heck was happening but it was bringing up command menus. Plus, the colors didn't work, it would only show in red. Maybe a new one is good, I can't be bothered ordering another one. Purchased a Logitech locally instead.
customer_reviews.author: SewAmykins

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our media room, but received a defective product. Customer service responded quickly and worked to fix the problem. Definitely satisfied with their responsiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It work with Raspberry PI 😁
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard. It works with my raspberry pi 4 using raspbian OS. "in case some of you Were wandering if it worked with raspberry pi." I also used this keyboard with Android and I had no problems, the devices I used were my Razer phone 2 and my Amazon Fire tablet. The keyboard is very light but it doesn't feel cheap, it feels like it is made of good quality materials. the keys are nice and smooth they required almost no effort to press them. The keyboard colors are really nice and the backlight brightness is just perfect. In my opinion for the price this is a AAA product.
customer_reviews.author: N3-C45

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Kindle Fire HD 10
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is the perfect solution to the shaking of my Kindle Fire when it's mounted on a gooseneck stand. The backlight is great for controlling movie or video apps late at night as well. I run old MS-DOS and Windows games with the DOS-Box app. Like an old PC it needs a Windows keyboard, a quick switch for this keyboard. To choose your keyboard layout just press fn-Q for IOS, fn-W for Android and fn-E for Windows. One small quibble. Like most portable Blutooth keyboards it's missing the insert key and a few of my old DOS and Windows programs need the key to run. That's something 99.9% of buyers won't even notice.
customer_reviews.author: Old Fone Phreak

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Keyboard, Fantastic Price
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard. This is the second BT Keyboard I've purchased to complement my iPad mini. The first, from a different manufacturer, was ok but too inconsistent in responding to what was typed. This one, however, does a phenomenal job. I'm frequently reticent when I see Amazon adds that list a noticeably high price crossed out and a much lower price offered. For this keyboard, I believe the original high price may be accurate as it captures the value of the product. That stated, buy this keyboard. The back light is fantastic, customer service is superlative (I had a question about the directions), and it's frankly saved me the cost of buying a Surface or something similar.
customer_reviews.author: MCS

customer_reviews.title: Good bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works well on my devices and it helps when typing long stuff because on that sort of thing the internal keyboard is murder on the fingers. It goes surprisingly long on a charge which I like a lot. I've used it on an amazon fire, a samsung j7 crown, and a samsung laptop. However, I've had difficulty in that when switching between multiple devices I've had to reinstall the keyboard. It's thin, has media control keys, special command keys which I've not learned yet, and I can even set it on my lap. So I think it was a value for what I paid for it and I think it'll last along time.
customer_reviews.author: Victoriacat

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard, awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. I went through 3 of the clamshell cases before I got this and I’ll never go back. I had an issue with the first keyboard I got when the space key quit working. I can’t say enough about how good customer service is with this company. I’ll buy from them again just based on that. I saw one review that complained about the customer service. Not my experience! After having companies go invisible and silent when I had a problem, this was a refreshing experience. I had a replacement in two days. I’ve tried a bunch of bluetooth keyboards and this is the best I’ve found. Good crisp keystrokes. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Foxfire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing keyboard with multifunction
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is amazing! It is thin and small footprint yet having a lot of function and decent battery life The various backlit colors that it offers is second to none with wide range of backlit keyboard colors suiting your personality Being able to run under any operating system from IOS, Android and Windows is something really great so you won’t buy several keyboards but a single one which can be used cross all platforms The buttons are very responsive and so far it didn’t fail or poped out of its place Just an amazing piece of kit!
customer_reviews.author: Khaldoon H.

customer_reviews.title: I have two of these; best keyboards ever.
customer_reviews.text: Takes some time to adjust to the small size, but these are great for travel, or home use. Works with any electronic I've tried to pair it with. My first keyboard did lose it's enter key when it bumped into a binder, which broke the butterfly lever thing. But, the caps lock key is the same size, so I just pried that off and put it where the return key was. I never use capslock so...
customer_reviews.author: LaFler

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard for Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: Finally a good (all be it small) replacement for my damaged Logitech K810 backlit Bluetooth keyboard. The back lighting on/off function works great just like the K810 used to. This is a must have feature for using in a dark room (Home Theater). Also back light level is quite good. Only two negatives are overall size (it's pretty small compared to most wireless keyboards) and battery life not what the K810 was. But! neither one of these are big negatives. I'm comparing to my old K810 which I loved but has been discontinued. For the price this Arteck HB030B is Fantastic deal!
customer_reviews.author: What!

customer_reviews.title: Great company; great standard Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This company is great. I work in home health and carry this around with me all day with the travel case. It fits perfectly in my lap when I'm doing notes in the car. Although it's thin and lightweight, it still feels sturdy in your lap with the travel case on as well. The first one I ordered was defective- it worked but overtime I realized it was not holding a charge and didn't connect properly. 7 months later I emailed the company and they sent me a new one right away after talking to me about what was going wrong. They totally honored their warranty policy with no gimmicks. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for PS4 chat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could chat in FFXIV on PS4. It's perfect for my needs. It's smaller than a regular keyboard so it's easy to pick up or move aside as needed. I have no problems typing with my large hands. The light up keys are really nice if you're in a dim room. The battery life is excellent. I also like being able to choose what color the light is. Would be good to use as a portable keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hayden

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this after the first purchase. I returned it and received a replacement. Very smooth transaction. The problem, again, is that the claims about battery power are completely a lie. I don't especially care about a wireless keyboard, but this thing -- a little while away from a charge and it disconnects and dies. This is why I returned the first keyboard. The second is exactly the same. If this matters to you, don't buy. I won't be so stupid again.
customer_reviews.author: mmd

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about as long as the 30-day return
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason the return window is only 30 days. Because it started having intermittent problems 32 days after purchase, and totally conked out shortly thereafter. Do not buy! I have purchased several different model keyboards by Perixx, and all of those work great! UPDATE: After my review posted, the seller contacted me with numerous poorly written and annoying emails. Rather than offer me a refund, they offered me a pair of their cheap (and one assumes just as poorly made) bluetooth head phones. My reply: If you are not going to refund my money, then keep you headphones. I have no need for more junk.
customer_reviews.author: W.P.

customer_reviews.title: To use as an external keyboard with my iPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard because my laptop died and I am attempting to use an already existing iPad Pro in place of it. I prefer a keyboard that is separate from a case. So this item filled the bill. It is a little smaller than a standard keyboard, but adapting to it (as to finger spacing) was not a big deal. It works well and so far my use of the iPad Pro in place of a previous laptop has worked out well. I do about 75% of what I used to do on the laptop and the other 25% that cannot be done on the Pro I do on an also pre-existing MacMini. So it's all good...
customer_reviews.author: J. Bevan

customer_reviews.title: ‘Key’ issues
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company’s customer service is awesome! I was contacted by the company, they listened to me and offered a replacement. Their warranty is for real. I am happy that they stand behind their product. So, I increased my rating. Worked fine for a month. It easily pairs with iPhone, iPad and laptops; decent sleep-wake-up time..no issues. Then, the ‘A’ key became not responsive. I have to press very hard and if I do so, a serious of A’s will appear. A keyboard without the key A and you can imagine the rest. Poor quality control. Sometimes I keep it upside down and use it as a mouse pad!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Artek has great customer service and replaced my keyboard for free with a newer model. :)
customer_reviews.text: I really love the way teh keys light up for typing in low light or dark. The battery hold a charge for several days while in use. My only issue was it didn't stay connected to my boothtooth connection very well, i have a Mac Mini computer. I had 2 apple magic1 keyboard which i experienced the same issues. I was contacted by an Artek customer service representative, who offered me a replacement with a brand new model coming out for free. Its nice to see that Artek cares about how satisfied its customers are with their product and offer a replacement absolutely free.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Sharrar

customer_reviews.title: Great little keyboard, good customer service too
customer_reviews.text: Update May 2019: I was contacted by Arteck and they told me they do have a warranty. They sent me a code to use on Amazon to get a replacement keyboard. This is a great keyboard and I'm very pleased with the warranty. Thanks to them for reaching out to me. I was wrong about the warranty, they stand behind their products. Original review: An OK keyboard for $20. However, if you put this in a briefcase, put a sleeve or case around it. Mine broke after only a couple months of travel in a briefcase. I guess I can't expect a lot of durability from a cheap keyboard, but the company doesn't offer much warranty protection either.
customer_reviews.author: mruseless

customer_reviews.title: What took me so long
customer_reviews.text: Entering search strings, URL's, and other such Firestick virtual keyboard activities often took as long as the movie I'd looked up. This paired flawlessly with my 4K stick and made any type of data entry a breeze. Haven't tried to copy and paste - that's possibly determined by the application. The multi-colored backlighting, which can be turned off, is also fun. Comes with small adhesive feet for desktop use. I didn't particularly need mouse emulation, so this filled the bill. Good quality, with good key travel feel and many multi-function choices.
customer_reviews.author: G. S. Tipsword

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for the Fire 10 Tablet
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the keyboard for the few times I need to type a lot of text. I prefer a tablet for most things but for the times I have a lot of text, I prefer a keyboard (I am old school - 66 years old). This device has a magnetic back that attaches to the Amazon cover for my tablet making it ideal - snugly connected. The size is also a perfect fit for the Fire 10 tablet. It is the exact thing I was looking for - occasion use to type text. I love it and would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: LinuxGuy

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size keyboard for my application...replacing TV remote data entry device
customer_reviews.text: I was getting pretty fed up with the old method of entering data in YOUTUBE and other app searches and if your remote isn't backlit its even more frustrating. The Arteck HB030B Slim BT 3.0 Keyboard is the perfect replacement. Backlight (7-color!) rechargeable battery and the fact that it paired right up with my Fire TV Cube is awesome. Charged it for two hours, LED went from RED to GREEN, paired it and bang, utilized it right away. What a refreshing input device!! 2 year warranty too!! Cool battery saver, shuts down after a few minutes of being dormant. Way to go Arteck...oh, consider getting the case for this, worth the cost and it looks great too.
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: My bad, I didn't read close enough to realize it was a MINI/COMPACT keyboard. Come on, admit it we search and search and after a while you've read so many product details they become jumbled together. lol Anyway, I was a mini for notebooks/tabs/etc. I needed this for a MAC desktop. Fortunately i worked for it. I'm quiet surprised that I ended up loving it. Enjoy not having a big ole corded keyboard on my lap. Extremely easy on the fingers and soft touch without the clickity click noise. Smooth and slick. Won't be going back to the regular keyboard anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Warmie

customer_reviews.title: Homeschooling
customer_reviews.text: With the kids now using iPads to complete schoolwork from home, we thought a wireless keyboard would help. It instantly became a commodity in the house, and we have ordered a second one because there is such a demand for the first. Our elementary aged sons enjoy being able to choose their own colors for the keyboard backlight. I do not know what other metrics to use to rate a wireless keyboard ie what else needs to be evaluated. For now, my children are typing fools and whipping through online learning on their iPads, and for only $20.
customer_reviews.author: Brad D.

customer_reviews.title: very compact
customer_reviews.text: My wife stole my BT keyboard a while back, so I got this one to replace it. It is very light and compact compared to my old keyboard. Also, it lights up so it is easy to see when it is on. My old keyboard didnʻt have any indicators at all to show if it is on or now, so sometimes it just gets left on and drains the batteries. Anyway, my wife saw this keyboard, and now I have my old keyboard back and my wife has a brand new keyboard. She likes it, it actually fits her hands a lot better, since it is a little smaller than the standard keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Rks

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard has good feedback mechanism and I like the low profile -- although not ergonomic. The backlight is nice as an added bonus. A con is I can't view the status of the battery but not a big deal. Its rechargeable to I'll connect it when necessary. My MBP recognized it immediately. The keyboard is a good buy and good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard in March and it was super easy to set up with and iPad. The keyboard is lightweight. The colors are fun, the battery lasts a long time, and the fell of the keys is very nice. Just this month, July, two of the keys broke off. I contacted the company and sent them a picture. No questions asked, they confirmed that the keyboard is under warranty and sent me a replacement code to order a new one. While I am bummed that two keys broke after only 3 months of use, I am very pleased with the level of customer service, hence the positive review.
customer_reviews.author: mdgirl76

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Good Customer Service Follow Up! Space bar broke off after 3 weeks of use!
customer_reviews.text: This is an updated review as after I posted the comment below the Customer Service Rep contacted me and replaced the item. I appreciate that the company has a product guarantee, and they also provided a keyboard case to protect the keyboard during transport. I think this will help remedy the situation of keys breaking off. Thank you Arteck for your assistance! Small, nice, portable keyboard. Unfortunately, the space board popped off after just 3 weeks of use and we are unable to return it. So if you plan to use it for travel or mobility expect it to break.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Updated review x2
customer_reviews.text: Update #2 After I did my last update the company reached out to me to offer a refund or replacement, since I had to buy another one as soon as this one stopped working I didn’t need a replacement so I told them I’d rather have the refund. That was two weeks ago and after I’ve send 3 messages I have yet to hear from them again or get a refund. Update: after a couple months the space bar has quit working and it is glitching. Unfortunate because the lights are cute on it 1st impression: Connected to my ipad7 perfectly. Love the lights for late night homework.
customer_reviews.author: Lody

customer_reviews.title: Decent keyboard, but warped
customer_reviews.text: The size is just right for efficient typing yet portability. I also purchased a travel case to protect this keyboard. However that was not enough to keep this unit from warping. The front is aluminum but the back side is plastic. Im not sure what cause this warping as this item has spent most of its 2 month life in its case on my desk. however it does not sit flat anymore due to warping. Update 1/15/20. Vendor has reached out and offered to warranty this item. Added a 4th star for outstanding customer service. Will update after some time with the replacement item.
customer_reviews.author: Abe Froman

customer_reviews.title: Worked for about a month (UPDATE)
customer_reviews.text: "I bought this as a remote keyboard for my studio and was attracted by the small footprint and price. Apparently the old adage is true; you get what you pay for. The keyboard doesn't hold a charge. At first, it stayed charged for about a week. Now it no longer holds a charge and will only work if the USB cable is plugged in. Big disappointment; lesson learned..." I was contacted by the company who were very courteous, and apologetic about the faulty keyboard. They promptly sent me a new one and told me not to worry about sending back the damaged one. The new one works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one exactly like this from a different seller in Amazon several years ago. I have always loved that keyboard for it's size and reliability. I was recently on the search for a bluetooth keyboard for a friend and spotted this one. It seems to be the exact same as the one I purchased years ago, just from another seller. It's the same experience as the other one. One thing I have to mention is that the ad for this keyboard states that it has three backlight colors to choose from. But it's actually seven. Not sure why the ad only states three. This keyboard is excellent and I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: kitgar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and setup lightweight keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a really good deal, especially with the under $20 price tag. Have only been using it one day, so can’t attest to the durability. Setup couldn’t have been easier with my ipad - turn it on and pops up in the Bluetooth settings. It is extremely light weight, so if its in your lap, moves around a little. Not sure how it’s going to travel; wish there were some kind of cover to go over the keys. I would even buy a case if available. Using it to type this, and it is definitely superior to an onscreen keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette A

customer_reviews.title: Prefer to SmartKeyboard Case
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this little keyboard. I purchased it for my 10.5 inch iPad Pro after being driven crazy by the Apple’s SmartKeyboard and it just fits my use case much better. Unlike the SmartKeyboard, it can actually be typed upon and the keys give a response and have some travel. The other thing I much prefer is that it doesn’t have to be crammed against the screen, but can be used at any (reasonable) distance or angle with the iPad. I find it solid and responsive with plenty of iOS keys and features. I’m hoping it will prove to be durable, but a couple weeks in, no problems.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves this keyboard! It has made homeschooling much easier. The Bluetooth is seamless and works perfectly. We are using it with an Acer chrome book tablet. Not sure how long the charge is, but it has lasted from 9 to 3 no problem. I have large hands and can also type easily and comfortably. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daddy of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Battery only lasts 15 mins
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few months ago. Works great apart from the fact that the battery only lasts about 15 mins before it needs charged again. Not sure if I got a defective one or not but it is basically useless. Doesn't work while charging, so I usually have to wait 15 mins for it to charge and then repeatedly charge it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Artek 3.0 Bluetooth keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The overall product review of this product was graded as a three because the overall functionality of the product does not live up to standards I expect from a Amazon product. The first thing is the charge port for the key board is poorly designed in that a USB charge cable does not stay in the keyboard which cuts down on overall charge. I would very much appreciate if you would either send me a replacement keyboard or refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: cliff noel

customer_reviews.title: Customer service makes all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Had an issue with the mini keyboard and, based on my review, Arteck contacted me right away and promised to resolve the situation (it wasn't even a scathing review - just the facts). After emailing back and forth a bit. they sent a replacement keyboard right away and kept checking in to make sure all was well. Even though the replacement was a slightly different model it worked like a charm. Typing this out on it right now. So even though I didn't quite get what I ordered I ended up with a nicer product and a great customer service experience. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Vincent

customer_reviews.title: I don't give 5 star ratings but.......
customer_reviews.text: I really don't have a reason not to. It's exactly what I expected plus, I have had NO issues. I'm actually using it now, this is around the 18th month. WAIT, I just found an issue, the caps lock light does not light. Since I'm not your usual moron, I can figure out if the caps lock is on. Not a deal breaker. Go ahead and buy it, it's worth it. PS, I don't remember charging this board much.......battery life is good also. READ the directions for your device, it IS necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Matrim

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard,  life saver
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a life saver. The ipad keyboard is terrible and when I run orders fir customers I was always switching back and forth to letters and numbers and symbols. I got sooo used to Samsung's awesome layout that has numbers above the letters. I just dreaded using that iPad, sho annoying. Now with this keyboard it's bearable having to use an apple product. It's about same size as the iPad and it fits in the case Dell sent with the iPad. No issues, have had for about 6 months now
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Looks and feels much more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: I got this yesterday and couldn't be more pleased. It wakes up much faster than my old keyboard, and the "feel" of the keyboard is great. Had I not just bought it for $20, I would assume it was much more expensive. The only con is that it a bit small for my XL paws, but it should fit the majority of people just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Clever User Name

customer_reviews.title: Super compact solid feeling keyboard.  I really like the feel of the keys.
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it five stars if the backlit keys were as easy to see as those on my now discontinued Logiteck K810, but this keyboard is much lighter and more compact. I'd love this little thing for travel if the key markings were nicely lit up and easy to see as I am a two finger typist and need to see the keys. As it is the lighting is passable but comes from behind the keys. Is there a way to make these so that only the key marking were illuminated and not the light from behind? Very good travel keyboard though!
customer_reviews.author: Test

customer_reviews.title: Terrific keyboard so far!
customer_reviews.text: Paired this with the case, and I love it. The keys are very responsive, and have a very nice resistance and pop back up immediately. Love the backlit feature, and my daughter loves the choice of colors. I love that it's a proper querty keyboard, with everything where it is on larger keyboards, and yet my hands don't feel cramped at all. Fits my Kindle HD8 perfectly, and I don't even have to remove the case (which is a folio type, so when I fold the cover back, that's the part that is resting between the keyboard and the stand part of the keyboard's cover. Highly recommend these two products.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Compact, lightweight, and holds a connection
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue with most bluetooth keyboards is whether they hold a consistent bluetooth connection. This keyboard maintains a consistent connection, and rarely has dropped or missed inputs. It is very thin and compact, but not so small that your fingers feel cramped when typing on it. The internal battery holds a charge well, but there is unfortunately no indicator of the exact battery percentage the keyboard has. It would be nice to have so I don't put it to charge more often than I need to, but this is by no means a dealbreaker. The variety of colors on the backlight and auto-sleep features for power conservation are nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ayah Muted

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose of a small keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is being used with a computer connected to the TV to stream internet content. The small size serves to keep out of the way when not being used as part of my entertainment center. It was easy to pair and activate. I like that the keyboard lights up making it easy to see in a darkened room. Designed to be used with tablets it is a bit small for my big hands, but still big enough to type on without difficulty. I also like that it has a rechargeable battery that the manufacturer claims should keep its charge for six months.
customer_reviews.author: Mequonite

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE - EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this, was the right size for my use but in spite of multiple tries, I could never get this keyboard to pair with any of my devices, laptop, Tablet or phone. Returned it and ordered a different keyboard. Return was easy and prompt. 9-24-19 - I received a response from Arteck, and they have offered to replace the keyboard at no cost. I have accepted their offer because I really want this to work with my devices. I am very impressed with their customer service, and will update my review after I have received the replacement keyboard and tried it out.
customer_reviews.author: koilover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard at the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Considering the cost of this product, I consider it an excellent buy. The only negative comment I would have is that when I turn the keyboard on, it doesn’t automatically connect with my iPad, which it should. I have to manually go into settings and connect. If I had payed a lot for this, that would have been a bigger deal. The keyboard is small and easy to type on. Very responsive as I am writing this review with it. Oh and the lights are great. Fix the connection issue and you get 5 stars from me.
customer_reviews.author: Connie S. Litrenta

customer_reviews.title: Small and very thin but not so small that it makes fast typing difficult.
customer_reviews.text: I am using this keyboard with my Samsung Galaxy A50 phone. I am using it for text messaging, email, and writing product reviews. 😁 I am loving the different colors of the backlighting and the ability to type things quicklly. It is smaller than a standard keyboard, but not so small that it makes fast typing difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard! We’ve bought two - the first one met its demise via accidental water, I loved it so much I bought the exact same one and it is good for my iPad or iPhone, I also use it on an older Android tablet for gaming. It’s easy to pair with different devices and is slim, lightweight and portable. I type a lot and it almost never needs recharging. A good little keyboard for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Frank M Brent III

customer_reviews.title: Glitchy - BUT EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is lightweight. That's the best I can say about it. I bought it 7 months ago. It has been "glitchy" from the start, randomly dying, not keeping a charge for very long (a couple of hours at first and now I just keep it plugged in, so much for wireless). Today the lights died. I'll be looking for a different brand/model after I finish this review. Update 3/20/2020 I am receiving a full refund and a full-sized replacement keyboard. Thanks to Arteck for making this right!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly N. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Nice small keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Nice keyboard. Took a bit of time to get used to turning it in, getting it synced, with the device, takes some steps. Key if using with Android is using Fn W to switch to that mode, it starts out in iOS mode when turn on. PROS Thin keyboard, flat back Battery life good. CONS Nothing to raise back of keyboard. Takes a while to get good at syncing
customer_reviews.author: DesertWanderer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly nice!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly nice to type on. I expected to hate this thing, but it works very well with my phone. I hate picking up my phone to respond to messages at work... I added small corner risers to the front of my work keyboard, and slide it under it when I dont need it. You can turn off the rgb to make it less obnoxious. My only complaint would be that hitting enter in my text app(Textra), it just spaces down instead of sending. Which may or may not be a feature. I don't knock a point for that, because it is likely an issue with the phone or app, not the board.
customer_reviews.author: Trav

customer_reviews.title: Cool Colors...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, when looking for a replacement for my old Bluetooth keyboard I mainly picked this one due to the ability to change the color of the back light. Since it was for a PS4, I wanted the color to be the Playstation blue. I like that it's rechargeable instead of replacing batteries since my old one went through AAA batteries like crazy. An odd thing about charging it is that you HAVE to have the keyboard turned ON or it will not charge, even though the charging light shows up. This is explained in the manual included with the keyboard, so it's not a secret. Just very odd.
customer_reviews.author: shadowgate100

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I had expected but that is on me. Love the portability, the battery-saving sleep mode, longevity of the battery between charges, connects to bluetooth without any trouble, and the choice of back key light is fun too. Great purchase for the price. CON - It feels a little flimsy and thin. I didn't put it through any drop or stress test as I would like to keep it working as long as possible but what I use it for, I see this lasting a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Dibberodale

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking to order!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for! I wanted to stop killing my wrists typing on my iPad, and this keyboard allows for that exactly. The package came quickly, and setup was as easy as turning on the switch and connecting in Bluetooth settings. The board itself is very light and the backlit keys are easy to see and type with. I do have smaller hands, so I prefer a board that is smaller and this is perfect! Since I just received it, I do not know about battery life or longevity for the keyboard but if anything significant arises I will update the review. As of now, I am 100% pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: lillgoalie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect so far
customer_reviews.text: Installed super easy, Bluetooth pairing was a breeze. I was afraid the keyboard might feel too cramped because it's so compact but it actually fits beautifully. I'm a hard, fast typist and I put it through its paces and it worked great. Love that there are so many color options but I'm most captivated by the red. I was also impressed to get an email from Arteck customer service offering support, which hopefully I won't need. For the price, performance, ergonomics, and visual appeal, this lightweight, small footprint keyboard makes an awesome addition to my home office set up. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bargain Goddess

customer_reviews.title: The Best Bluetooth Keyboard I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: As I write this review, I'm using the actual product. I purchased an Acer Nitro 5 laptop and they keys became a problem where I couldn't type anything, so I decided to buy a bluetooth keyboard, the first one I purchased was magnetic and turned my laptop off when it was just an inch away, so I sent it back and tried this one and now that I'm using it, it feels so fluid and I can now type very quickly without missing a key. I unboxed the keyboard and used it immediately, the battery lasted a good 5-7 days before I had to recharge it. Thank you so much for this product! Best Bluetooth Keyboard Out there!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I've had this keyboard for a month and a half ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this keyboard for a month and a half. It is much too flexible, so I had to put it on a rigid piece of plastic in order to use it on my lap. It would not work with my bluetooth adapter so I had to buy one it would work with. After a short time of use it began stuttering which requires slightly twisting it or turning it off/on. I have ask for a replacement from iArteck support. Waiting. 7-10-18 iArteck support reached out to me and is sending a different replacement keyboard. Due to that, and due to their very courteous response I am raising their rating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Casey W

customer_reviews.title: Not working with Windows 10, v1903
customer_reviews.text: The seller really needs to go re-test these with the latest version off Windows 10. The are not recognized by my motherboards built in Bluetooth since Windows updated the v1903. I have tried it on 2 different computers and it simply won't be recognized by Windows. Seller, if you don't want a bunch of these returned then update your post.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: awsome
customer_reviews.text: for the price this thing is great. backlight is perfect for working in the dark. very thin and light weight keys feel good connected easily to my hp as it has built in bluetooth. as other reviews say fn+e will fix the escape key fn+lightbulb alt+arrow up will change color. had it about 4 days now with off and on use and still have not charged it since it was pulled from the box. Update been about 2 weeks and only had to charge it once great little key board for light use
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Santos

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard quality is awesome,  is off for an IPad Pro
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome there's no issues with the looks and quality. I just can't seem to use the at symbol, my commas are set on different keys. The keyboard setting really throws me off especially when i have to do college papers. I did do reaserch on how to set up the keyboard. Overall I'm satisfied with the product. Update: They keyboard synced with my iPad and the keys are working awesome. Best purchase ever! Wish it came with a USB cord but yes worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cazandra

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because it is CONSTANTLY disconnecting and reconnecting. ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because it is CONSTANTLY disconnecting and reconnecting. I can understand if it's a power-saving feature, but it even happens when it's plugged in and charging. It's also smaller than I was expecting, but I don't mark it down for me not being able to read.
customer_reviews.author: Peter L

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight portable keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a keyboard for my PS4 and this serves that role perfectly. Connection was relatively easy and the keyboard automatically connects when it wakes up (keyboard goes to sleep to save battery). For the low price it's a great deal for a rechargeable, lightweight, portable, bluetooth keyboard. This thing also lights up in all kinds of colors (not that I personally care). Only issue I see is durability (it's all plastic) and that you need instructions to know certain shortcut commands (can always google it).
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Works with all of our devices
customer_reviews.text: The type cover for my daughter's Surface stopped working. I got this keypad a month ago, for distance learning. She uses it everyday and so far no major problems. It works on all of our Bluetooth devices and switches between IOS, Android, and Windows easily. We tried it on our iPad mini, Surfaces (pro and pro 3), as well as with my Samsung phone. My daughter says it's not great for fast pace games because sometimes there is a delay. The only issue we've come across was that the language was changed accidentally and we had a tough time figuring out what happened. There are built in shortcuts so keep the instructions card handy for troubleshooting.
customer_reviews.author: Sheyna

customer_reviews.title: Letters get sticky after a while
customer_reviews.text: I've been real happy with this product until recently. It's now getting stuck on some letters & typing them multiple times & Ii have to go back & edit most of what I say online! It's a pain in the butt! Wouldn't you KNOW, it's typing THIS just fine! It figures! Update!. . . They are being incredibly generous & sending me not just a replacement, but an UPGRADE! These folks are AWESOME! They really know what customer service is all about & they stand behind their products! They've also been very helpful in trying to help me figure out the issue! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Justin Dancing Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, fast, and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with how easy it was to connect the keyboard to my iPad (it's so simple!). I enjoy the backlight, and the options to turn it off. The keyboard is incredibly light, and while it takes a little time to get used to typing on such a small keyboard, I really appreciated the lightweight factor of it which makes it suitable for being on the go. Once the keyboard has been connected to a device, all it takes is a flip of the switch to turn it on/off and reconnect it to the device. It's so easy to use and makes typing a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Ou

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful little keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful little keyboard. It is about 6" x 9 1/2", about 2/3 the size of a full-size keyboard but it is large enough so that a touch-typist can use it easily. In addition, it has a dramatic backlighting feature in multiple colors. I had trouble with mine going to sleep with a Raspberry Pi and the Arteck service technician bent over backwards to help me. (Turned out the problem was with the Pi, not the keyboard.) Not only is this a fine product, but it is an excellent company to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handwritten notes not legible? Purchase this OUTSTANDING keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard so I could do my daily devotions and take notes while using my Google Pixel. I'm so happy I made this purchase! The keyboard was easy to set-up (Bluetooth-wise) and is easy to use. I like the feel of the keyboard when I'm typing and the battery life is pretty good, too. When I purchased the keyboard, Amazon also suggested the protection case and carrier case. I'm glad I purchased these items so I could protect this amazing purchase! The price for the keyboard along with protection case and carrier case was quite reasonable. I highly recommend purchasing these products!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Perez

customer_reviews.title: Nice product but needs case
customer_reviews.text: I really love this keyboard! The bluetooth connectivity is awesome, the battery remains charged for a significant period of time, the backlight is helpful and attractive. Keys feel nice. The only thing I wish was that this came with some sort of case - I had to invest in one separately. I use this with my iPad to take notes in class. Would recommend, but make sure you have a case in mind as well because it seems a little too fragile to just throw in a bag.
customer_reviews.author: LEK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect portable keyboard for travel.  Works great with my iPad Mini 5.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased an Arteck HB030B keyboard, and I’m very impressed with its quality and portability. For home use, I prefer a Logitech K380 which is more substantial (and heavier). But the Arteck is perfect for travel, because it’s so light and thin. I plan to take the Arteck with me whenever I’m traveling. I don’t need the backlighting often, but it’s nice to have it available for use in dim areas. Overall, I give the Arteck 5 stars as an excellent keyboard for portable use. The Arteck works perfectly with my iPad Mini 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tennessee Phil

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I each got one for our respective tablets. We have not used them extensively, but we are very happy with them so far. My husband has large hands and was concerned at first about the size. He found it very comfortable to use, and very suitable for his needs. I love the backlighting, and the functionality. I had a bluetooth keyboard previously that was so dysfunctional I ended up giving it to my kids as a toy. This one is better by leaps and bounds. smooth, quiet typing, and all the versatility of a full-size keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer Support
customer_reviews.text: Update on 5/7/17 Arteck customer service team followed up and sent a free replacement. Full marks to the Customer Support team. For now, the new keyboard is working as advertised. Will update after a little usage... -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Unfortunately, for the Keyboard I received, backlight is not working properly. It just turns on for few seconds after powering on keyboard and later turns off event after pressing the light bulb key. Also it does not change colors. Going to return it.Pairing was simple and straight forward and keys felt good even for a small keyboard.e
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Online tool for school (paired with iPads)
customer_reviews.text: Due to online schooling I bought my kids this keyboard to go with their iPad. It’s been great and really I’m happy with the product so far. The only downfall I would say is that I’m not sure ergonomically if this would be a very comfortable keyboard to type for hours but for spurts of time ex. iPad or tablet use Would be great. My kids really enjoy it and especially enjoyed the backlit keys on the keyboard. I’m curious as to how long it will go before needing a charge. Again really happy with the product. Wish I could’ve given us 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Josh N

customer_reviews.title: Little but Mighty
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was surprised at the size. Though after I started using it became easy to get used to the size. Easy to use and feeling of a much larger keyboard, in fact, I am typing with it now. Comes with a manual that should be at least skimmed so that the first row of keys make sense since they don't match the other wireless keyboards I have. Strange to use Bluetooth for something other than cell phone earpiece. Recharged when I noticed the backlit was fading. So far, I think this is great. I like the living room dark for better TV viewing and I like typing into my laptop without turning on lights. Absolutely, great!.😎👽💀
customer_reviews.author: Skullator

customer_reviews.title: Almost too thin. Needs feet- but excellent value and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I had previously purchased an Anker keyboard to use with iPad/ iPhone. It does after I spilled coffee on it. I bought this as a replacement because of the backlog keys. I love it. It works great, and lets you change colors, etc. My only negative comment is that it’s so thin it warps. When I got it, it didn’t lay flat. Also, it lacked and sort of rubber feet- so it was sliding around my desk. I’ve since added some feet to it, and it’s much better.
customer_reviews.author: Frank in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great for iPad Pro, Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this keyboard for my iPad Pro before starting medical school. I love that it is light weight, small, the sleek design, and long battery life. It worked well and without any problems for a little over 1 year of school, but then suddenly stopped charging. I contacted Arteck and they promptly responded and sent me a new keyboard. Very professional and great service. Thank you! I love this keyboard and am glad I can continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ramirez

product_meta.title: Arteck HB030B Universal Slim Portable Wireless Bluetooth 3.0 7-Colors Backlit Keyboard with Built in Rechargeable Battery, Black
product_meta.description:
Let there be Light 
Elegant blue LED backlight with 2 adjustable brightness level, 7 different colors(deep blue, soft blue, bright green, soft green, red, purple, cyan) making typing that much more enjoyable and awesome to look at. Backlight will auto turn off when idle to conserve power for when it is most needed. 

Cross Platform Compatible 
Fully functional to all four major operating system: IOS / Android / MacOS / Windows, and features system-specific function keys for each operating systems. Any Bluetooth supported devices such as tablet, smartphone can easily paired and gain quick access to common functions, such as volume level, playback control, copy paste text, and more. 

Comfortable, quiet typing 
The whisper-quiet, low-profile keys bring a whole new level of comfort to your fingertips. What's more, keep all your most-used functions and media controls closer than ever Windows-dedicated hot keys. 
Keyboard with scissors kick construction can be used more than 3 million times continuously. 

Portable Keyboard with Zinc body 
Sleek, ultra-slim design makes for easy portability. Just 0.37lb weight, makes this wireless keyboard extremely portable & the perfect travel accessory. 
Stylish design with high-grade anodized Zinc Alloy back shell ABS plastic brushed finish front panel. 

Rechargeable Battery 
Built-in industry-high rechargeable Li-polymer battery provides 6-month use on a single charge. (based on 2 hours non-stop use per day and backlit off) 

Note: 
1. This keyboard doesn't support the Win 8 Mobile. 
2. For Android 4.4 users: The Caps Lock indicator may not light, but will still function normally.
feature_bullets: 7 Unique Backlight Color: 7 Elegant LED backlight with 2 brightness level and auto sleep feature to maximize power usage.

Broad Compatibility: Use with all four major operating systems supporting Bluetooth (iOS, Android, Mac OS and Windows), including iPad 10.2 / iPad Air 3 10.5-inch (2019) / iPad mini 5 (2019) / iPad 9.7 inch iPad 6 2018, iPad 5 2017 / 10.5 inch, 11 inch and 12.9 inch iPad Pro, iPad Air / iPad mini / iPhone / Android Tablets like Samsung Galaxy Tab, Google Nexus / Windows / Mac, etc.
6-Month Battery Life: Rechargeable lithium battery with an industry-high capacity lasts for 6 months between charges (based on 2 hours non-stop use per day and backlit off)
Ultra Thin and Light: Compact size (9.7 X 5.9 X 0.24in) and light weight (0.37lb) allows easily carried and packed backpack, messager bag or case.
Package contents: Arteck Backlit Bluetooth Keyboard, USB charging cable, welcome guide, our 24-month warranty and friendly customer service.
